name: ESPN Fantasy Edits v 0.3
description:
The default ESPN Fantasy Games layout was not to my liking; so I tried to make it look different.  Not a big fan of green or orange ( football and basketball, respectively ), so this is predominantly Carolina blue, as I am a UNC fan.  So, if you like, great; if not, sorry and feel free to change if you use it.  Suggestions are also definitely welcomed.  

12/3/09 - Changed colors in Message Board area.
        - Changed Move, Here, To IR, Locked, etc buttons

Leave feedback if you want...As stated, suggestions welcomed...
